mapper.insert: insert into tb_enterprise_staff_agent (id, agent_id_type, agent_id_num, agent_phone, agent_fullname, is_deleted, create_time, modify_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{agentIdType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentIdNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentFullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update tb_enterprise_staff_agent set agent_id_type = #{agentIdType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agent_id_num = #{agentIdNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agent_phone = #{agentPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agent_fullname = #{agentFullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, agent_id_type, agent_id_num, agent_phone, agent_fullname, is_deleted, create_time, modify_time from tb_enterprise_staff_agent where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
